compatibility.notes: OLDAP-1.1 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses that impose stricter distribution terms.

key_requirements: Provide a copy of the license with any distribution.
Include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the Package.
State changes made to the Package if modifications are applied.
license.name: OLDAP-1.1
obligations: Duplicate all original copyright notices and associated disclaimers when distributing verbatim copies.
Insert a prominent notice in each changed file stating how and when it was changed if modifications are made.
Make modifications Freely Available or place them in the Public Domain if distributed.
